org.pojava.util
Class ReflectionTool

java.lang.Object
  org.pojava.util.ReflectionTool

public class ReflectionTool
extends Object

The ReflectionTool class provides static methods for accessing an object's properties.

Author:
John Pile

getNestedValue

public static Object getNestedValue(Method[] getters,
                                    Object bean)
Drill down to a nested bean property from predetermined methods.

Parameters:
getters - A trail of nested methods leading to the property.
bean - Root bean
Returns:
Result from getter method represented by the inner-most nested property.

Returns:
